name: 100dayscss
description: 1. Choose your branch (do not touch `master`) eg. `git checkout -b feature-name` 2. install less `npm install -g less`    - and run `npm install -g less-watch-compiler` if you want watches folders(and subfolders)for file changes and automatically compile the less css files into css. 3. cd `static` folder and run `less-watch-compiler less css`
author: lauraenria
